amendment.description: Amendment increases the age relating to the transfer of obscene material to children from 16 to 18.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 12 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to increase the age of minors from 16 to 18 with respect to the transportation and sale of obscene material.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Canady amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
